name: This tutorial explains how to use this app
Use the ğŸ® button to capture controller input. Buttons are recorded according to the controller selected in the top-right
Use the âŒ¨ï¸ button to capture keyboard input
Items with the left checkbox ON are included in output
Uncheck the checkbox to exclude from output
Categories can be nested multiple levels
When 3 or more nesting levels exist outer categories become headings (H2 H3...) then Section and Sub-section from the outside in
This tutorial has 3 levels of nesting so all root categories are treated as H2 headings
When only 2 or fewer nesting levels exist all root categories are treated as Sections
Check the badge next to each category name to see its role in the cheatsheet
